scripts.start: chmod +x ./setup_real_world_example.sh && ./setup_real_world_example.sh && ts-node src/drydock.ts scan mock-repos/inventory-service mock-repos/order-service --open
scripts.test: ts-node tests/test_identifier.ts && ts-node tests/test_scanner.ts && ts-node tests/test_scanner_edge_cases.ts && ts-node tests/test_cli.ts && ts-node tests/test_whitelist.ts
